alert.note: Alert for Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 12 at 3:48AM MDT until April 13 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning today, northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts to around 60 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, northwest winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...The Pennington County Plains and the Southern Meade County Plains. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from noon today to midnight MDT tonight. For the High Wind Watch, from Wednesday morning through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...The high winds may blow down large trees and damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Persons outdoors should watch for flying or falling objects that may injure you. If you are driving, be prepared for sudden wind gusts that can cause you to lose control of your vehicle, especially on open stretches, or as you approach the crest of hills. Also be alert for debris or dust blowing across the road.

area.areaDesc: Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains
